Package crypto.webservice.services

Interface EncryptionSvc

All Known Implementing Classes:
EncryptionSvcImpl
public interface EncryptionSvc
Service that provides encryption and decryption of data. Data is treated as an opaqu value of any size.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    byte[]
    decrypt(String ciphertext, String keyId)
    Decrypt data using the specified key.
    String
    encrypt(byte[] b, String keyId)
    Encrypt data using the specified key
    int
    getExtraBytes(String keyId)
    Returns Extra bytes of data a particular encryption identified by keyId adds.
    boolean
    isKeyValid(String keyId)
    Checks if key is valid.

  • Method Details

    • encrypt

      String encrypt(byte[] b, String keyId) throws EncryptionSvcException
      Encrypt data using the specified key
      Parameters:
      b - byte[] of input data
      keyId - String value that specifies the key
      Returns:
      String value of base64 encoded ciphertext
      Throws:
      EncryptionSvcException - General Exception without underlying cause.

    • decrypt

      byte[] decrypt(String ciphertext, String keyId) throws EncryptionSvcException
      Decrypt data using the specified key.
      Parameters:
      ciphertext - String value of base64 encoded ciphertext. It should be the same value as returned during Encrypt operation.
      keyId - String value that specifies the key.
      Returns:
      byte[] value of decrypted data.
      Throws:
      EncryptionSvcException - General Exception without underlying cause.

    • getExtraBytes

      int getExtraBytes(String keyId)
      Returns Extra bytes of data a particular encryption identified by keyId adds. Clients should use this method to validate the input before invoking decrypt.
      Parameters:
      keyId - String value that specifies the key.
      Returns:
      Value of number of extra bytes.

    • isKeyValid

      boolean isKeyValid(String keyId)
      Checks if key is valid.
      Parameters:
      keyId -
      Returns:
      true/false depending of whether the keyId is valid.
